attributes.action: Abolition of Human Rights For Convicted Criminals
attributes.additional_details: Removal of all EU legislation regarding human rights for those convicted of criminal acts.  Return of a prison system which penalises and debases individuals to a degree where they do not ever wish to return to prison, 4 to a shared cell, no comforts, bread, water and fruit for meals and a shared toilet in the middle of the cell without means of privacy.  100% completion of the sentence awarded without remission, reward or any shortening of sentence.
